component_name: 0.91 Inch I2C SSD1306 OLED Display Module DC 3.3V-5V
description: OLED display, no need backlight, self-illumination. Display Color: Blue. These I2C OLED Display Modules come without pin headers. The display performance is better than the traditional LCD display, also lower consumption; IIC (I2C communications) simplifies connections. Use with Arduino, ESP8266, ESP32, STM32, etc; 3.35v Power.

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect GND to ground, VCC to 3.3-5V, SCL to I2C clock, SDA to I2C data.

source_document:
0.91 Inch I2C SSD1306 OLED Display Module DC 3.3V-5V

Description
OLED display, no need backlight, self-illumination.Display Color: Blue.
Plz note: These I2C OLED Display Module comes without pin headers
The display performance is better than the traditional LCD display, also lower
consumption; IIC (I2C communications) simplifies connections
Use with Arduino, ESP8266, ESP32, STM32, etc; 3.35v Power
Operating temperature:-40 - 85 ℃; Resolution: 128 x 32

Specifications
Driver IC: SSD1306
Size: 0.91 inch OLED
Resolution: 128 x 32
Size: 38 * 12 mm
Interface Type: IIC interface
Display Color: Blue
Pin Description:
GND: Power Ground
VCC: Power + (DC 3.3 ~5v)
Operating temperature: -40 ~ 85 ℃
SCL: Clock Line
SDA: Data Line
Package Including
1 * 0.91 Inch I2C SSD1306 OLED Blue Display Module
